title: TextItem
description: Normalized representation of an ingested textual artifact (news article, caption, comment).

id.description: Stable UUID generated when the item first enters the pipeline.

source_type.description: High-level channel, e.g., news_api, rss_feed, instagram_post, instagram_comment.

source_id.description: Producer-specific identifier (article URL, IG media id).

source_metadata.description: Unstructured metadata blob for source-specific attributes (author, tags, follower counts).

ingested_at.description: When the pipeline stored the item (UTC).

language.description: ISO 639-1/639-3 language code from detection stage.

body.description: Plain-text body after cleaning (HTML stripped, emojis normalized).

entities.description: Structured entities resolved during preprocessing (companies, tickers, hashtags).

labels.description: Optional manual labels for training/QA workflows.
